name: Absolute 2fa For Woocommerce
author: AbsolutePlugins

sections.description: Absolute 2fa For WooCommerce plugin seamlessly integrates into your WooCommerce login page implementing a two-factor authentication process! This will help you to prevent brute force attack for your WooCommerce shop. The plugin will provide you a straightforward usages experience as there in no configuration required.
sections.installation:
If not installed, install Two Factor Authentication first.

Automatic Installation (Recommended)

  1. Search for ‘Absolute 2fa For Woocommerce’ in the ‘Plugins » Add New’ menu in WordPress.
  2. Click the ‘Install’ button. (Make sure you pick the right one).
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Check My Account » 2FA Settings, if it’s 404 then flash permalink.

Manual Installation

  1. Upload absolute-2fa-for-woocommerce and it’s contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Check My Account » 2FA Settings, if it’s 404 then flash permalink.
sections.faq:
2 FA Settings Page not found (404)!

Please flush the permalink settings.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – 2022-02-17

  • Tested with the latest WordPress & WooCommerce available
  • Update dependency notice.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.

short_description: A Two Factor Authentication addon that will add 2fa settings page under WooCommerce's My Account Page.
description: Absolute 2fa For WooCommerce plugin seamlessly integrates into your WooCommerce login page implementing a two-factor authentication process! This will help you to prevent brute force attack for your WooCommerce shop. The plugin will provide you a straightforward usages experience as there in no configuration required.
